name: mcp-playwright-server
description: A comprehensive MCP server providing browser automation capabilities using Playwright. Enables LLMs to interact with web pages through structured accessibility-first selectors.
author: j0hanz

tools.name: browser_launch
tools.description: Launch a new browser instance (Chromium, Firefox, or WebKit)

tools.name: browser_close
tools.description: Close a browser session

tools.name: browser_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL in the browser

tools.name: browser_navigate_back
tools.description: Go back to the previous page in browser history

tools.name: browser_resize
tools.description: Resize the browser viewport

tools.name: browser_tabs
tools.description: List, create, close, or select browser tabs

tools.name: element_click
tools.description: Click on an element using a CSS selector

tools.name: element_fill
tools.description: Fill text into an input field

tools.name: element_hover
tools.description: Hover over an element

tools.name: click_by_role
tools.description: Click an element using its ARIA role (recommended)

tools.name: click_by_text
tools.description: Click an element containing specific text

tools.name: click_by_testid
tools.description: Click an element using data-testid attribute

tools.name: fill_by_label
tools.description: Fill an input field using its associated label text

tools.name: fill_by_placeholder
tools.description: Fill an input field using its placeholder text

tools.name: page_screenshot
tools.description: Capture a screenshot of the page

tools.name: page_content
tools.description: Get the HTML and text content of the page

tools.name: wait_for_selector
tools.description: Wait for an element to appear or disappear

tools.name: execute_script
tools.description: Execute JavaScript code in the page context

tools.name: keyboard_press
tools.description: Press a key or key combination

tools.name: keyboard_type
tools.description: Type text character by character

tools.name: mouse_move
tools.description: Move the mouse to specific coordinates

tools.name: mouse_click
tools.description: Click at specific coordinates

tools.name: tracing_start
tools.description: Start recording a trace for debugging

tools.name: tracing_stop
tools.description: Stop recording and save the trace

tools.name: network_route
tools.description: Intercept and modify network requests

tools.name: network_unroute
tools.description: Remove all network routes for a page

tools.name: accessibility_scan
tools.description: Scan page for WCAG accessibility violations

tools.name: sessions_list
tools.description: List all active browser sessions
